The disk is ready for timeshift. But we recommend to change a disk(of speed >5.0 MB/sec) for better performance. Please press any key to leave this page

Media controls hidden, press d-pad to show

This is a dev extension for %1$s (%2$s), automatically added by the LeakCanary library.

LeakCanary is a memory leak detection library for Android, created and open sourced by Pierre-Yves Ricau at Square.

You can learn more about memory leaks at https://squ.re/leaks.

We welcome contributions from the community - please do not hesitate to report an issue or open a pull request!
Found %1$d retained objects grouped as %2$d distinct leaks (%3$d new)
Are you sure you want to delete all leaks?

LeakCanary is running and ready to detect memory leaks.

Please grant external storage permission, otherwise memory leaks will not be detected.
Click to enable storage permission for %s.
LeakCanary is dumping memory to investigate leaks.
